column1: Burns, Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery MSc
column3: Division of Surgery and Interventional Science
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL﻿Gain core knowledge and understanding of the latest plastic and reconstructive surgical techniques on this highly innovative MSc, the only programme in burns, plastic, and reconstructive surgery currently available. Work with the latest technologies, learn from world-leading experts, and emerge with the sought-after skills and translations knowledge to carry out your own clinically applied research.The programme is designed to give you a robust understanding of the fundamentals of scientific and clinical research within plastic and reconstructive surgery.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL﻿
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
